h2_title: All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations
h3_title: Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 6 Location
content: The final Buddha's Eyeball statue can be found directly on your left from the Rockrest Flat shrine in Fright Cliff. It is practically impossible to miss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 6 Location'.
The content is as follows:
The final Buddha's Eyeball statue can be found directly on your left from the Rockrest Flat shrine in Fright Cliff. It is practically impossible to miss.
